<!--**Seems too long**-->

**Bought**
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00ISCEZNK/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o03_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
- 5mm pitch
- total length 300mm
- 15 mm width

- ~57 mm between axes of both gears
